channel.title: Lunar altar messed up in ddsspeced base need help asap!
channel.description:
Hello moparians, i hope you'll read this and know the answer First of all i added lunar altar at my home with no errors when i compiled.. But when i click the altar to change the spellbook it freezes the client and it crashes ill show the error..
Exception in thread "Thread-6" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 18787 at client.method36<client.java:1585> at client.method102<client.java:7889> at client.method9<client.java:8772> at applet_sub1.run<applet_sub1.java:123> at client.run<client.java:4588> at java.lang.Thread.run<Unknown Source>

item.title: Lunar altar messed up in ddsspeced base need help asap!
item.dc:creator: @Coelho Coelho
item.description:
@Coelho wrote:

Why do you feel the need to put “NEED HELP ASAP!!!” as your topic title? Do you feel some superiority over all of the other people waiting patiently to be helped?
Please. Face reality.

OT: You’re using a client that does not have the required model (nor modifications) for a Lunar Altar.

Read full topic
item.source: Lunar altar messed up in ddsspeced base need help asap!

item.title: Lunar altar messed up in ddsspeced base need help asap!
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

Your interface id must be too high.

Read full topic
